front.title: The Definitions of Managed Objects for IP Mobility Support using SMIv2, revised

abstract.t: This memo defines the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in TCP/IP-based internets. In particular, it describes managed objects used for managing the Mobile Node, Foreign Agent and Home Agent of the Mobile IP Protocol. This memo is intended to update and possibly obsolete RFC 2006, however, it is designed to be backward compatible.
